text: Etihad Airways is one of two major airlines in the United Arab Emirates. It was created by royal decree in July 2003. It started carrying passengers in November 2003. Abu Dhabi, the capital of the United Arab Emirates, is the airline's hub and base of operations. Etihad Airways flies to 63 locations in 42 countries. == References == File:Etihad Airways - JFK - June 2014.JPG|An Eithad Boeing 777 File:Etihad Airways - A6-ETG - Boeing 777-3FX(ER) - MSN 39681 - VGHS.jpg|An Eithad Boeing 787 Dreamliner Category:Airlines of the Middle East Category:2003 establishments in Asia
title: Etihad Airways
